Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells offer the possibility of high temperature synthesis of chemical products with cogeneration of electricity, a process known as chemical cogeneration.
Titulo: Technical and Economic Evaluation of a Methane Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: This research primarily addresses the likelihood of upscaling present bench-scale experimental results of methane fuelled SOFCs.
Titulo: Technical and Economic Evaluation of a Methane Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: Methane coupling, i.e. production of C(2) hydrocarbons, is one of the possibilities of chemical cogeneration.
Titulo: Technical and Economic Evaluation of a Methane Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: In evaluating the co-generating SOFC, the methane-coupling design was compared to two other possible competing designs, namely, a regular SOFC plant (complete oxidation of methane to CO(2) and H(2)O) and an SOFC plant coproducing synthesis gas.
Titulo: Technical and Economic Evaluation of a Methane Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: It was found that the rate of return for the regular fuel cell exceeded 25% whereas that for the ethylene plant was about 21%.
Titulo: Technical and Economic Evaluation of a Methane Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The synthesis gas plant was well behind at about 17%.
Titulo: Technical and Economic Evaluation of a Methane Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The reasons that have so far prohibited large-scale application of such systems are discussed.
Titulo: Technical and Economic Evaluation of a Methane Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
